text: Love Me Deadly is a 1972 American horror movie directed by Jacques Lacerte and starring Mary Charlotte Wilocx, Lyle Waggoner, Christopher Stone. It was distributed by Cinema National. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 horror movies Category:1972 LGBT movies Category:American horror movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies about necrophilia Category:Movies about cults Category:Movies about socialites
title: Love Me Deadly
